alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 3:53PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Union County through 430 PM PDT... At 352 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northeast of Granite, or 15 miles west of North Powder, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Grande and Union. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Grande Ronde Valley; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
